TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 指定在工作台上設定個別工作所需的所有資料。

span.span: Specifies all the data that is required to set up an individual task on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需使用 MMC 程式設計\_任務結構和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
